heading: black farmers win suit
subheading: the us government will pay up to black farmers who say the agriculture department discriminated against them for decades in awarding loans and other aid. a deal reached tuesday will give as many as 4,000 farmers a tax-free cash payment of us$50,000 and erase their usda debts. the farmers have long complained they were denied government loans, disaster relief, and other aid because of their race, and did not get fair hearings from the usda when they appealed.
author: wired staff
